org.electrocodeogram.module
Class ModuleRegistry

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.electrocodeogram.module.ModuleRegistry

public class ModuleRegistry
extends java.util.Observable

This is the central ModuleRegistry which maintains information about all currently instanciated modules and all module class files in the module directory from which module instances could be created at runtime. During its creation every module object registers with the ModuleRegistry with its unique id. On deletion of a module the module is deregistered from the ModuleRegistry.

setFile

public void setFile(java.io.File filePar)

filePar - This should be the module directory

The class object

UnknownModuleIDException - If a module class with the given id could not be found

Parameters:

registerModuleInstance

protected void registerModuleInstance(Module module)
This method registers a module instance with the ModuleRegistry. If the module instance is allready registered with the ModuleRegistry nothing happens. This method is automatically called whenever a new object of class Module is created.

Parameters:
module - Is the module instance to register

getModuleInstance

public Module getModuleInstance(int moduleId)
                         throws IllegalModuleIDException,
                                UnknownModuleIDException
This method returns the module instance with the given moduleId.

Parameters:
moduleId - Is the id of the module instance to return
Returns:
The desired module instance
Throws:
IllegalModuleIDException - If the given moduleClassId has a value of < 1
UnknownModuleIDException - If a module class with the given id could not be found

createModuleInstanceFromModuleClassId

public void createModuleInstanceFromModuleClassId(int moduleClassId,
                                                  java.lang.String moduleName)
                                           throws ModuleInstantiationException,
                                                  IllegalModuleIDException,
                                                  UnknownModuleIDException
This method takes the id of a module class and returns the module instance of it. It also gives the module instance the given name.

Parameters:
moduleClassId - Is the id of the module class to be instanciated
moduleName - Is the name that should be given to the new module object
Throws:
ModuleInstantiationException - If an exception occurs during the instanciation of the module
IllegalModuleIDException - If the given moduleClassId has a value of < 1
UnknownModuleIDException - If a module class with the given id could not be found

deregisterModuleInstance

protected void deregisterModuleInstance(int moduleId)
                                 throws UnknownModuleIDException,
                                        IllegalModuleIDException
This method removes a module instance from the ModuleRegistry. It is called from the Module.remove() method.

Parameters:
moduleId - Is the id of the module to deregister.
Throws:
IllegalModuleIDException - If the given moduleClassId has a value of < 1
UnknownModuleIDException - If a module class with the given id could not be found

getModuleDescription

public java.lang.String getModuleDescription(int moduleClassId)
                                      throws IllegalModuleIDException,
                                             UnknownModuleIDException
This method returns the description of the module class with the given id. The description is given by the module developer in the module's "module.property" file.

Parameters:
moduleClassId - Is the id of the module class to get the description of
Returns:
The description about the module class
Throws:
IllegalModuleIDException - If the given moduleClassId has a value of < 1
UnknownModuleIDException - If a module class with the given id could not be found
